title: Every disciple is a Boss S1
summary: Gao Leng Dao Zun, the first god of the universe, recruits young girls who are bound to become big bosses in the future as his disciples, and leads them on an adventurous journey to change the universe towards destruction. The road ahead is difficult and full of difficulties. Can they successfully pass the test and build a new world?
subtitle: Over Goddess

title: Epic of Divinity Light
summary: Thousands of years ago, the land of China was filled with the spiritual energy of heaven and earth, and those who could exorcise this energy for their own use were exorcists, whose mission was to stop the once-in-a-millennium heavenly demons from plaguing the world. However, during the Han dynasty, the spiritual energy of heaven and earth disappeared overnight, which was known as the “silence of all laws”. In order to stop the conspiracy, Chen Xing, the last great exorcist in the world, took the treasure “Heart Lantern”, which had been deposited in his soul, and set out for Xiangyang to find the Dharma Guardian, the god of war, who was destined to work with him to exorcise the demon
subtitle: Ding Hai Fu Sheng Lu

title: Embers (2025)
summary: On the planet after the disaster, the young boy Ye Yu went to Embers City for an assessment in pursuit of his dream. He faces numerous murderous intentions and mysteries, and the truth behind them is impossible to unravel.
subtitle: Embers, Yujin Xingzhe

title: Eclipse of Illusion (2025)
summary: A beautiful wedding turns into betrayal by a beloved. No longer seeking immortality, a single thought transforms into darkness. The powerful and tragic heroine embarks on a path of vengeance as a killing deity, determined to eradicate all.
subtitle: Yun Shen Buzhi Meng

title: Earth spirit song
summary: A tomb-raiding adventure donghua. The story follows a group of adventurers as they explore ancient tombs, face dangers, and uncover secrets while seeking treasures and solving mysteries.
subtitle: di ling qu

title: Dragon’s disciple
summary: A modern martial arts donghua based on the novel. The story follows a young man who learns traditional Chinese martial arts and applies them in modern times, combining ancient techniques with contemporary challenges.

title: Dragon Prince Yuan
summary: A cultivation donghua following the journey of a young man who becomes the Primordial Sovereign. Through cultivation, battles, and adventures, he rises to become one of the most powerful beings in the universe.
subtitle: yuan zun

title: Divine Lord of the Heavens S1
summary: Le jeune homme Qin Yang était très talentueux et possédait l’artefact de cultivation enviable « Star Gate ». Cependant, cette chance lui a été retirée du jour au lendemain. Alors qu’il était sur le point de mourir, Qin Yang a ouvert le trésor couvert de poussière « God Bead » dans son corps. Depuis lors, il a restauré la mémoire de ses neuf vies précédentes et a gagné une nouvelle vie. Dans le même temps, la famille est tombée dans une crise sans précédent. Face à de nombreuses épreuves, Qin Yang a pris en charge ses propres affaires et s’est appuyé sur l’expérience accumulée au cours de ses neuf vies antérieures pour surmonter les difficultés encore et encore. De manière inattendue, les conspirateurs continuent d’avancer pas à pas. Afin de protéger les personnes qu’il chérit, Qin Yang choisit de se battre jusqu’au bout.
subtitle: Shendao Dizu - Shinto Emperor : rebirth of Qin Yang

title: Divine Dragon Star Master
summary: Long ago, the guardian dragon, known as Ancient Strife, protected the Dragon Star. However, after sustaining severe injuries in a battle against extraterrestrial foes from ancient times, Ancient Strife fell into a prolonged slumber. Awakening to a changed world, Ancient Strife discovered that the once-revered Dragon Star had transformed, and the dragon, once admired, was now considered a menace. To unravel the truth and retrieve a treasure hidden within the Dragon King Academy, Ancient Strife assumed human form and entered the academy as a mentor. However, fate took an unexpected turn as Ancient Strife mistakenly became a teacher in the Dragon Slayer department. Balancing teaching and searching for the treasure, Ancient Strife discovered that those who held information about the Dragon King’s treasure had already passed away. The only lead now rested in the hands of Vice Principal Yejang Xue. As Ancient Strife got closer to Yejang Xue, several times intervened to assist her, leading to a deepening connection between them…
subtitle: Shen Long Xing Zhu - Dragon Star Lord

title: Chronicles of Everlasting Wind and Sword Rain
summary: A cultivation donghua combining elements of fantasy and martial arts. The story follows cultivators as they master sword techniques and immortal methods, facing enemies and uncovering ancient secrets.

title: Chief Spirit Master
summary: Last century, Shi Dali was sealed for 100 years, but he accidentally discovered Qingqing, the celestial nine tails fox. He started his path to become Chief Soul Master, to find out the mistery of his origin and to protect the world.
subtitle: Chef Soul Manipulator

title: Carp Reborn S3
summary: Wang Sheng woke up in the modern world, everything was so real and dreamlike. Emergence of the imperial city, appearance of the young master of Family Dai confused the situation. Through a gambling game, Wang Sheng gradually realized it was not just an argument between him and the young master of Family Dai. As a result of the feast, people from all over the world gathered together, and Wang Sheng was once again called to stand in front of the stage. Although Wang Sheng knew that the fights on the field were far less than the dark tide under the field, he didn’t realize that the people of the world were quietly becoming another gambling chip … Even though the dream appeared to wake him suddenly, the key to breaking the situation remained hidden. The inscription nine words wheel is also quietly dialing.
subtitle: yuan long

title: Carp Reborn S2
summary: Continuing the story of Wang Sheng, who has evolved his carp soul and gained new powers. As he navigates the complex world of soul cultivation, he faces new challenges, stronger enemies, and deeper mysteries. With his unique abilities and strategic mind, Wang Sheng continues his journey to become a legendary figure in the soul world.
subtitle: yuan long

title: Carp Reborn S1
summary: Special Forces Wang Sheng traveled to the soul world and was possessed by the waste carp Yuan soul, becoming a veritable waste person in the soul world. Wang Sheng used the knowledge he had learned in the world of master spirits like Yun Yuan to pass the battle, and even found a way to evolve the waste carp Yuan soul! The sparrow becomes a phoenix, and the carp leaps to the dragon gate. Wang Sheng has embarked on a road of Jackie Chan from the sinister soul dispute!
subtitle: yuan long

title: Blader Soul
summary: Deux enfants qui vivaient dans l’ombre d’une famille aristocratique aspirent au légendaire pays des fées de Penglai. Les sorciers sont arrivés, l’étoile Gan Shi est passée et la pierre étoile a jeté un trépied, réveillant le pouvoir enfoui dans chacun de leurs corps ainsi que leur désir jusqu’alors inédit.
subtitle: Bu Xing Si Yuan Qi

title: Beyond the ocean S2
summary: The emperor led a journey to find the island of Foshan. During the trip, the young prince Jianwen witnessed the sudden death of his father, murdered by Admiral Zheng, who was also a teacher and friend to him. The young prince was framed as the murder of his own father. Out of desperation, Jianwen stole the Azure Dragon ship and escaped. Being chased by Admiral Zheng, pirates and Japanese Shogun, Jianwen and his new friends Ninja Qi Li, Mongolian Navy Tenggesi, Harold, have begun a journey in South China Sea to find out the truth of his father's death.

title: Beyond the ocean S1
summary: During the emperor's patrol of the sea, Prince Jianwen witnessed his teacher and friend Admiral Zheng suddenly regicide. He was framed by the court for patricide and seized the throne. In a panic, he drove the Qinglong Spirit Ship back to Quanzhou and intended to return to Nanjing to confront his uncle Prince Yan. Admiral Zheng accepted the order of Prince Yan, the regent, and returned to Quanzhou to arrest Jianwen. After Prince Jianwen saw through the truth, he started his escape journey south from Quanzhou. During his escape, Jianwen made friends with Japanese ninja Qili, Mongolian navy commander Tengges, and Portuguese naturalist Harold. The four of them formed a sincere friendship during their adventure and prepared to embark on a journey to find out the truth of Admiral Zheng's regicide, with the largest pirate base on Penglai Island in the South China Sea as their target. At this time, various forces inside and outside the court were ready to make a move.
subtitle: Si Hai Jing Qi

title: Battle through the Heaven Special 2
summary: In a land where no magic is present. A land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Three years ago, Xiao Yan, who had shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything. His powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancee suddenly shown up?
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong: Tebie Pian 2 - Sha Zhi Lan Ge

title: Battle through the Heaven S5
summary: After three years of not seeing each other, Xiao Yan finally met Xun’er at Jia Nan Academy. After that, they became closer and established the Stone Gate (Pan Gate). In order to continue to improve his strength and avenge him on the Misty Cloud Sect, he risked continuing to go deeper into the Qi Refining Pagoda to devour the Fallen Heart Flame
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong - fights break sphere

title: Battle through the Heaven S4
summary: Xiao Yan came to the imperial capital to participate in the Alchemist Conference to awaken Master Yao Lao, but due to his extraordinary power, an evil enemy conspired to fight him. At a critical moment, Xiao Yan managed to turn things around and managed to win the championship, retaining the honor of the Jiama Empire. Xiao Yan welcomed the upcoming 3-year agreement with a not-so-happy heart.
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong - fights break sphere

title: Battle through the Heaven S2
summary: Xiao Yan had been waiting for three years before finally meeting Xun’er at Canaan Academy. After their meeting, he made new friends and established the Panmen group. However, his ultimate goal was to avenge his father and improve his strength so that he could join forces with the Mikami Yunlan Sect. To achieve this, he committed a personal crime and went deep into the Sky Burning Qi Refining Tower to devour the fallen heart flames. After defeating the Yunlan Sect, Xiao Yan’s mentor, Yao Lao, was taken by the Soul Palace. In their pursuit of Xiao Yan, the Soul Palace enlisted the help of the Little Fairy Doctor and ordered the Poison Sect to attack the Yan Alliance. Despite successfully defending his alliance, Xiao Yan was afflicted with demonic poison spots. To cure himself and rescue Yao Lao, Xiao Yan, along with the Little Medical Fairy and Zi Yan, journeyed to Zhongzhou. Little did they know the dangers that awaited them there.
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong - fights break sphere

title: Battle through the Heaven - The Three-Years Agreement
summary: The talented young man became a scum and was ostracized by his family, coupled with his fiancée who came to his residence to break the marriage in public. Xiao Yan made a three-year agreement and shocked the audience with a bold statement: “30 Years of the West River, 30 Years of the East River, never bully someone casually! ” With the help of Mr. Yao Lao, the legendary counterattack was opened by this fallen genius!
subtitle: Doupo Cangqiong: San Nian Zhi Yue

title: Apotheosis S1
summary: Zen Luo, who is now a menial slave, used to be a young master of a big family, owing to the decline of his family, his sister is imprisoned by a strong force, he has no choice but to be at others’ service. However, Every cloud has a silver lining, The ancient book left by his father actually conceals the magical spell, which can change a human into an instrument! What’s the mysterious power behind all these? This is a contest with fate.
subtitle: Bai Lian Cheng Shen

title: Ancient Supremacy
summary: Lin Yun, once a sword slave in the Qingyun Sect of Tianshui Kingdom, is reborn with extraordinary potential. Though previously known for his poor aptitude, his life changes after mastering the Fierce Tiger Fist technique, allowing him to break through to the third level of martial arts, qualifying him as an outer disciple of the sect. However, despite his progress, Lin Yun continues to face discrimination from other disciples due to an unwritten rule: “Once a sword slave, always a sword slave.” On his challenging martial arts journey, Lin Yun must defy expectations, seize every opportunity for growth, and break free from the stigma of his past to reach the pinnacle of martial arts mastery.
subtitle: Yishi Du Zun, Ancient Lord - The Sovereign’s Ascension

title: Ancient Lords S2
summary: Time traveler Meng Qi only wants to be a merry and graceful swordman, but he suddenly becomes the world-renowned “Mad Monk” in accomplishing his repeated and unlimited mission in the “reincarnation space”. However, all this turns out to be planned by a powerful ancient lord. The story tells how the invincible and funny monk makes his way around in the world of martial arts and becomes a legendary swordman.
subtitle: Yishi Zhi Zun

title: Ancient Lords
summary: Meng Qi is a time traveler who always wants to be a charming swordsman in white. But unexpectedly, he becomes a world-renowned “mad monk holding a blade” while accomplishing a tough mission in the infinitely continuous “time travel”. Yet, everything turns out to be the trick of an ancient lord. This story tells the legend of a funny monk who wanders around in the world of martial arts and the three realms.
subtitle: Yishi Zhi Zun

title: Alchemy Supreme
summary: An alchemy-focused cultivation donghua. The protagonist masters the art of pill refinement, becoming the supreme alchemist while using his skills to cultivate and battle enemies in the world of cultivation.

title: Against the sky supreme
summary: A cultivation donghua about a supreme being who defies the heavens. The protagonist, through cultivation and battles, rises to challenge the natural order and become an ultimate power that even the heavens cannot control.

title: Against the Gods
summary: In the mystical Cangyun Continent, the Medicine Sage Yun Gu met a brutal end due to his possession of one of the Seven Heavenly Treasures, the coveted Sky Poison Pearl. This pearl became the desire of all realms, leading to Yun Che, his disciple, seeking vengeance for his master’s death, resulting in a trail of bloodshed. Ultimately, Yun Che found himself cornered at the treacherous Desolate Sky Cliff. In an act of desperation, he consumed the poison pearl and plunged to his apparent demise.     Yet, guided by an unknown force, his consciousness traversed the boundaries of time and space, awakening within the body of a young boy named Xiao Che in the Flowing Cloud City of the Tianxuan Continent. Born with damaged profound veins, Xiao Che was mocked as a profound energy waste within the city. Unexpectedly, he found himself married to Xia Qingyue, the city’s most beautiful woman and a disciple of the esteemed Ice Wind Immortal Palace, due to a pact between their parents.     Jealousy festered within Xiao Yulong, a fellow clan member, leading to an attempt to poison Xiao Che on his wedding day. However, thanks to Yun Che’s extraordinary time-traveling experience, Xiao Che not only survived but also merged the knowledge of two lifetimes into one. As fate would have it, he also harbored the soul of the enigmatic and extraordinarily gifted girl, Jasmine, residing within the Sky Poison Pearl. From that moment, Xiao Che embarked on an unpredictable and captivating journey, filled with extraordinary challenges.
subtitle: nitian xie shen

title: Adventure in subduing the demons
summary: In a forgotten era buried in dust, ancient powers vie for their path to become emperors. Jiang Hao, a modern young man who was once just a pawn, embarks on a journey into the prehistoric Great Wilderness to uncover the mystery behind his father’s disappearance. Armed with a partially complete “power bank” totem, he battles fierce adversaries, forging a path through primitive tribes and ancient cities. His journey takes him across dangerous lands where he learns ancient totemic sorcery from the powerful beasts he encounters. Battling not only men and beasts but also the heavens themselves, Jiang Hao faces cosmic threats that aim to engulf the six beautiful wildernesses. In a final act of defiance, he transforms himself into a blazing sun to confront the otherworldly demons. Little does he know that destiny’s chains are tightening, and his father’s presence remains a haunting memory.

title: Above the Kingdom of God (2025)
summary: Six days and nights, a strange case, and the boy returning to twelve years ago, can he break the shackles of the Kingdom of God this time
subtitle: Shenguo Zhi Shang

title: A Mortal’s Journey to Immortality
summary: Han Li practiced hard for many years in the cave in Tianxing City and finally succeeded in forming the elixir. After leaving seclusion, Han Li searched for the spiritual object Heavenly Thunder Bamboo to refine a magic weapon. He was involved in the battle between Miaoyin Sect, Jiyin Island, and Yinsha Sect. He finally succeeded in refining the magic weapon, the seventy-two-mouthed green bamboo bee cloud sword. Later, when Han Li was exploring the ruins, he encountered the mysterious and powerful former Yuanying monk Master Xuan Gu and heard the legend of Xutian Palace. Han Li realized that the map he had obtained before might be one of the remaining maps of Xutian and decided to go to Xutian Palace to search for it. Opportunity.
subtitle: Immortal Ascension

title: A moment but forever
summary: In ancient times, Ji Tanyin, a mortal Yanshi, relied on her Heaven-Defying Mechanism ability to construct the Heaven and Earth Mechanism, and then rose to become a peerless goddess, maintaining the order of the Three Realms in the God Realm. However, the divine world was suddenly bathed in blood by the demons. Wushuang sacrificed her “God’s Heart” to create the ultimate artifact “God’s Hand” and wiped out the demons in one fell swoop. However, the “God’s Hand” was unexpectedly lost in the human realm. The Heaven and Earth Mechanism stopped working, and the divine world withered away. Wushuang, who lost her “heart”, became a mortal maiden and descended to the human realm in search of God’s Hand. She counterattacked High Priest Youhu. After experiencing peerless love, she used the Heaven-Defying Mechanism to counterattack everyone. She eliminated the demons and resolved the disputes of the Three Realms in one fell swoop, saving the world and all living beings.
subtitle: Nian Wushuang

title: Legend of the Ethereal Sword-Immortal
summary: A cultivation donghua following the journey of a young swordsman who discovers the ethereal sword techniques, a legendary martial art that transcends the physical realm. The protagonist must master these mystical sword techniques while navigating through dangerous territories, facing powerful enemies, and uncovering the secrets of the ethereal realm. As he progresses, he learns that the path to becoming an ethereal sword immortal requires not just martial prowess, but also understanding the balance between the material and spiritual worlds.
subtitle: Ethereal Sword Immortal

title: Back as Immortal Lord Episode
summary: A reincarnation cultivation story where a powerful immortal lord returns to his past life to rewrite his destiny. Using his knowledge from the future, he navigates through challenges and cultivates to become even stronger than before, while preventing past tragedies and changing the course of history.
subtitle: Immortal Lord Reborn

title: The Gate of Mystical Realm
summary: An epic fantasy donghua about a mystical gate that connects different realms. The protagonist discovers the gate and embarks on a journey through various mystical realms, encountering powerful beings, ancient civilizations, and uncovering the secrets behind the gate's existence and its connection to the balance of all realms.
subtitle: Mystical Realm Gate

title: Divine Manifestation
summary: A cultivation donghua where the protagonist discovers the ability to manifest divine powers. As he grows stronger, he uncovers the truth about his divine heritage and must face powerful enemies while protecting those he cares about. The manifestation of divine power comes with great responsibility and danger.
subtitle: Divine Power

title: World Defying Dan God
summary: A cultivation donghua focusing on alchemy and pill refinement. The protagonist, a talented alchemist, defies the heavens with his exceptional pill-making abilities and rises to become a legendary Dan God, challenging the natural order and creating pills that can change the very fabric of reality.
subtitle: Defying Heaven Dan God

title: The Eternal Realm
summary: An epic fantasy donghua set in the Eternal Realm, a place where time and space converge. The protagonist must navigate through this mysterious realm, facing ancient powers and uncovering the secrets of eternity while seeking to protect the balance between realms and prevent the collapse of reality itself.
subtitle: Eternal Domain

title: Ascendants of the Nine Suns
summary: A cultivation donghua where the protagonist discovers the ancient power of the Nine Suns, each representing a different aspect of cultivation and martial arts. Through rigorous training and battles, he must master the energy of all nine suns to achieve the ultimate ascension. The story follows his journey from a humble beginning to becoming a legendary cultivator who can harness the power of the nine suns, facing powerful enemies and uncovering ancient secrets about the origin of this divine power.
subtitle: Nine Suns Ascension

title: The Divine Emperor of Destiny
summary: An epic cultivation story where the protagonist discovers his divine heritage and destiny as the chosen emperor. Through trials and tribulations, he must master divine powers, overcome powerful adversaries, and fulfill his destiny to become the Divine Emperor who will reshape the world and restore balance to the realms.
subtitle: Destiny Emperor

title: Long Shen Wan Xiang
summary: A cultivation donghua where the protagonist discovers his connection to the Dragon God, an ancient and powerful entity. Through this connection, he gains access to the myriad phenomena - the countless manifestations of power in the universe. The story follows his journey as he masters dragon techniques, navigates through various mystical realms, and uncovers the true nature of the Dragon God's legacy. As he grows stronger, he realizes that the Dragon God's power is not just about strength, but about understanding the interconnectedness of all things in the universe.
subtitle: Dragon God Myriad Phenomena

title: I am Yingtai
summary: A donghua following the story of Yingtai, a character who embarks on a journey of self-discovery and cultivation. The story combines elements of fantasy, martial arts, and personal growth as Yingtai faces challenges and uncovers hidden truths about their identity and destiny, drawing inspiration from the classic tale of Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai.
subtitle: Yingtai

title: The Flame Imperial Guards
summary: An epic donghua about the Flame Imperial Guards, an elite group of warriors who protect the empire with their mastery of fire-based martial arts. The story follows their battles against dark forces and their quest to maintain peace and order in the realm while uncovering ancient secrets about the source of their flame powers and the true nature of their duty.
subtitle: Flame Guards

title: Nine Suns Martial God
summary: A cultivation donghua where the protagonist masters the power of the nine suns to become a legendary Martial God. Through intense training and battles, the hero must harness the energy of nine different suns, each representing a different aspect of martial power, to achieve the ultimate level of cultivation and protect the world from destruction.
subtitle: Nine Suns God

title: The Legend of Wuhun Continent
summary: An epic fantasy donghua set in the Wuhun Continent, a mystical land where martial souls determine one's destiny. The story follows young cultivators as they awaken their martial souls, train in ancient techniques, and battle against powerful enemies. As they explore the vast continent, they uncover legendary secrets and face challenges that will shape the future of their world.
subtitle: Wuhun Continent
